summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Lindeu Avenue from North Forty-second Street to 100' north of Allen Place, et al, in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers under Ordinance No. 20317, creating Local Improvement District No. 1955 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
